q: Larry Page , now 37 and graying. While Eric Schmidt travels the world meeting with business partners, government officials and potential takeover targets, Larry Page says he will be making most of the big decisions as he tries to rekindle the soul and passion of a start-up. Sergey Brin will concentrate on developing new products. He's worth$ 15 billion, but Larry Page remains something of a rebel who has always had a disdain for corporate protocol.

several shock-blocking sports pads. When Michael Vick returned after missing three games with a rib injury, he wore a vest designed by Unequal. He later wore shoulder pads and thigh pads made by the company. The Unequal technology is a part of my game now and I won't play without my Unequal, Michael Vick said in a statement acquired by the Associated Press.
